long_description: The Impulse daypack from STM carries a laptop, books and other necessities in an easy-to-carry backpack. Multiple compartments keep your gear organized and ready to go. Tough, durable polyester fabric stands up to constant use; polyethylene foam pads the laptop compartment and the shoulder straps, protecting your computer and ensuring comfort. Multiple external zippered compartments help organize your gear and daily necessities; dedicated technology pocket allows easy access to laptop. Interior organizational pockets make traveling a breeze by keeping things in place and within reach. Reflective tab for nighttime visibility. Luggage pass-through sleeve slides over rolling luggage pull handle for easy companion wheeling.
short_description: The Impulse daypack from STM carries a laptop, books and other necessities in an easy-to-carry backpack. Multiple compartments keep your gear organized and ready to go.
